website_summaries.verdict: These unique earmuffs slip over the ear and stay on well.
pros: These are more portable than most earmuffs since there are no bands or wires involved
cons: These aren't as warm as traditional earmuffs, and they can become separated

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I wanted something to cover my ears when it's really cold, but not mess up my hair completely. I honestly really didn't hold out much hope that they would really work, but they were a good price so why not try. I am quite surprised and pleasantly so. They do work, they do stay in place and they are warm enough! I do wear hearing aids so they aren't the perfect solution as they tangle a bit with my hearing aids, but that really isn't surprising or unexpected so all in all, I say they are a solid purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Micky Cox

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I have very sensitive skin an worried about the tag, seems, and fabric. It takes a few tries to get the pop on right but it works well. I am also sensitive to things pressing on head and ears but these do not bother. They work well with my glasses, although occasionally I have to free the arm and reset the ear. I quickly almost forget they are on, so they are perfect. I may get them a little thicker next time.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany L.

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THESE PADS WORK. I WANT TO USE THEM TO PROTECT MY RIGHT EAR FROM GETTING SQUASHED AND CAUSING A SCAB. AT FIRST THEY WERE A LITTLE TRICKY TO PUT ON BUT ONCE IN PLACE THEY FELT FINE AND I COULD HEAR WITH NO PROBLEM. BUT WHEN SLEEPING THEY WOULD FALL OFF DURING THE NGHT. I PURCHASED SOME MAKEUP ARTRUS TYPE GLUE USED FOR HOLDING VARIOUS DISGUISES PLACE. IT WORKS SURPRISINGLY WELL AND THE EAR PROCTORS STAY IN PLACE ALL NIGHT
customer_reviews.author: Older Critic

customer_reviews.title: not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: $16.95 is what I paid for it. It's woefully not worth it. At the very least it is functional and looks like what is pictured. But it wasn't as warm as I wanted it to be. The warmth is comparable to headphones. It didn't fit well with glasses, a bike helmet, and certain hats as well. At the very least, it didn't fall off, but adjusting head pieces, and glasses was difficult. If you don't do any activities that require this like sports, I'd suggest you just get headphones.
customer_reviews.author: rolexTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Low Profile Easy to Wear
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these that I keep in coats, in my car, and that I use to go out and feed or ride my horses. My ears are very sensitive and will get very sore from even a little wind. I have suffered from perforated ear drums three times in my life. These easy to wear low profile ear pops help to keep my ears from being sore, or getting an ear infection.
customer_reviews.author: ArizonaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep ears warm!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these for years and bought these so I would have spare pair. I am amazed I haven't lost one (or both) of my original pair. I cannot tolerate the cold on my ears when I walk my dog and these have always been great. They work with earbuds and they don't mess up your hair like regular earmuffs do. I am so glad my original pair still had the tag on the inside so I could get the exact same ones again. I bought another pair (a different brand) while back and they weren't nearly as insulated as my ear mitts.
customer_reviews.author: ToothNumber11

customer_reviews.title: For the cold and biking!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this while biking to reduce wind noise. I never leave home without them. It's the best to reduce wind buffeting and can be used for cold-weather use. Even in the hottest of hot temperatures, my ears never felt hot while wearing these, too. If you're a cyclist, do yourself a favor. Use these so you can hear more and save your hearing!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Buy the adult size even if you have small ears!!
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the adult vs. the child sizes. I have small ears so I thought the child sized ones would be most suitable for me based on the measurements;; however, they were too small! All was not lost, though, as my granddaughter likes them. I will have to get another pair for myself before winter sets in.l because they are very comfortable, keep the wind & the cold out without being too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Fits securely and does the job
customer_reviews.text: These were a little weird at first. They took a little getting used to, but my son loves them now. They're small and simple and they work well for keeping ears warm! I wasn't sure if they would stay on his ears very well, but they DO! They are great. I'm thinking about buying more for the rest of the family. FYI: My son is an average size eight year old, and size small fits perfectly. Small would even work for my very tiny five year old, but just barely.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works for heat but not great for protection
customer_reviews.text: Our need was not for warmth, but to cover ear and make it more comfortable to lie on one's side. This need was due to an external sore on ear or just a tender ear that reduced ability to sleep. It was hard to get the mit to fit comfortably. But helped Pricey item that did help, but not economical for results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product may be completely unusable if you have flared ears
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a perfectly good product for many people but it absolutely doesn't work for me. I have somewhat flared ears, and the semi-rigid cups bend my ear cartilage and cause initial discomfort, and after a while (I tried them on both ears for an hour) considerable pain. They do fit snugly and keep your ears warm, but I believe this product deserves to be down-rated because it is implicitly presented as a one-size-fits-all product, but the design in NOT suitable for people like me with flared ears.
customer_reviews.author: Gimlet Eye

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Product
customer_reviews.text: These Bandless Ear Mitts are a must for Men and Women in cold weather climates. Easy to place over your ears. Protect you from high winds and very cold air. I have worn them for years and hope that they stay on the market for generations to come. Prevents earaches for those who are subject to ear issues. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: AntBGonBad

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear mitts! I buy them as gifts for everyone and they love them. They are so convenient to pop on and off. They lock in place and stay on. I promise you they don't move or fall off and they are so warm. If you are not a hat-wearer, they are perfect! I wear coats with hoods so the ear mitts keep my ears warm when driving or going short distances but I can always put up my hood.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lauria

customer_reviews.title: Keeps warm but makes sore
customer_reviews.text: It kept my ears warm...but over time, the metal clips made my ears very sore. I recommend purchases a brand that replaces the metal with a plastic or rubberized clip so it wont pinch the ears to firmly and make it sore later.
customer_reviews.author: DaVil

customer_reviews.title: I love them! No painful bands digging into my head
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased my first sets of ear mitts about five years ago. I love them! No painful bands digging into my head. They're compact and fit in a pocket. My co-worker was admiring them so I ordered two pairs, one for her and another for me from Amazon. I haven't been able to find the right brand until now. The ones I ordered from another place were not the same, not as good. So relieved to find these again!
customer_reviews.author: lmariesteve

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of these. I've used them ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of these. I've used them on an almost daily basis for many years, primarily for bicycling. They eventually wear out (maybe after 8 or 10 years), but they keep your ears warm and really stay on, even in high winds. They may be a little trouble with tightly fitting hats, but I swear by these and find them worth the price difference versus the cheaper offerings on the market, which don't provide as much wind protection and lack the thicker lining. After discovering these I stopped even bothering with traditional ear muffs.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis1958

customer_reviews.title: These are so amazing! I got my husband a set of these ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazing! I got my husband a set of these are he absolutely loves them. They are easy to wear, warm, and not bulky like regular ear warmers. You can even wear your favorite stocking hat or baseball cap with them and they don't cause a problem. Everyone should have a pair of these,. Would make a great stocking stuffer for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Braget

customer_reviews.title: They fit well but don't keep ears warm
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the try but they don't have much fabric to warm the ears. The air gap keeps cold air inside. I'm inserted tissue paper and that helped a bit. I only tried these indoors, so that's how little extra warmth they provide. I would rather wear a headband or a large slouchy beanie for warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia V

customer_reviews.title: Brillant product
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs are the best I ever had. no bands to hold them on and they are so warm and lightweight you don't even know you have them on. Keeps the cold and wind out. I recommend these to anyone who has problems with their ears in the cold and wind. Excellent product ever invented...Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Terese DiMartino

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace a pair I’ve had for years. I love this product. I get painful earaches in the cold and wind. I always wore earmuffs but these are even better. No one can tell I’m even wearing them with my hair down and they keep my ears warm and protected in the cold weather. Soft fleece. They snap securely onto your ears. It doesn’t hurt. When I take them off I either put one in each pocket of my coat or put both in my purse. Very compact. Arrived the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Maria P

customer_reviews.title: Stays on and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am not usually one to leave reviews, but this is a great product. The prior reviews were correct. They fit well, stay on, and are very comfortable. Just took a walk and it was around 40 degrees. Without these ear muffs, I would have been quite uncomfortable. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea of these, but they don't really work or fit.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these.It's November in Chicago and really not even that cold yet but I've worn them a few times to check them out.Disappointing.Regardless of whether there is wind present or not, they just slip off.I've had to pick them up off of the ground after they fell multiple times.I hadnt been touching them or anything.They also do not fit close to the ear and I even got the smaller size.Because they arent snug I feel wind blowing in underneath them!My ears are not any warmer with these. It's too bad, because they are also quite expensive.The price would be worth it if they worked, but for me, anyways, they do not.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lidstrom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I wish I had them years ago! They fit great....just as described. So easy to use. They are comfortable and really keep your ears warm. I thought they might be a problem with ear rings but not so. They fit just fine over my ear rings. And they don't mess up your hair. They do a great job of blocking the wind too. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Yolie

customer_reviews.title: Best Winter Accessory, Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I have big, curly hair, so I hate hats or things with a big band. These are awesome! Plus, they just fit in your pocket, so they are easy to have with you just in case. They are warm and keep the wind off your ears. I have worn them with earrings and all the time with earbuds in while commuting, and that has never been a problem. They stay in place, regardless of time or wind. They are comfortable and easy to put on and off. They don't really impede hearing. GREAT product.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I love these, it's my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I work on a playground, in Michigan. It gets cold. I get tired of regular earmuffs, as after a while I get a headache from them, and I've found the plastic part flips forward when wearing a hood over my head. I love these, it's my second pair. They cover the ears and I can wear a hood over my head, or take it off and my ears are still protected. I even take them camping in the spring and fall, as I can have them in my pocket if I need them. Great product well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: DJShuster

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to ear muffs.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. A much better alternative to earmuffs with a band. Make sure to measure your ears. This brand has a little bit of elastic around the ear hole so they feel secure.
customer_reviews.author: ian rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Band free and pretty warm
customer_reviews.text: These do a good job blocking the wind and cold. I ordered a size small and they seem pretty big anyway. I may need to return them because they do feel a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product in every regard
customer_reviews.text: Have quite a few pairs in different colors - I stash them in coats, car, tote bag. Just wanted an extra pair for another tote. My first pairs have lasted for years. So easy to use and even work well when wearing earrings. I wear them under knit hats to give my ears extra warmth and even under baseball style hats. They stay on well and fit easily in a pocket when not needed. Love them and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteShepMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfection! :)
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! I've been looking for them for a long time. The earmuffs that wrap from behind your neck bother me because they crush my ears against my glasses. THESE bandless ear mitts are perfect! They have a metal band that snaps firmly against my ear so they will not fall off. They don't crush my ears, they don't mess up my hair, easy to carry in my pocket when I no longer need them. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Way too hard and uncomfortable compared to other options on here. Hurts your ear after a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Norsegaud

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but my wifes loves these. I think its a hair thing. They seem to fit nice and dont fall off.
customer_reviews.author: OH I Bought More Crap!!!

customer_reviews.title: Blocks all drafts.
customer_reviews.text: They perform as described. They are very warm, blocking all drafts and fit very snugly around the ears. I would suggest that you order up one size tho, as I ordered the medium size, and they are a bit too snug. I should have ordered the large.
customer_reviews.author: ckayeone

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick, though more uncomfortable than I though they would be
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -They totally solved my "excruciating ear and jaw pain after running outside in the cold" problem -They fit fine and are easy to put on -They don't fall off while running -Warm Cons: -You can't wear earrings with them (even studs), so you have to take them off every time -They kind of hurt a little bit when you put them on; they're stiffer than I thought **UPDATE: got sick of the way they hurt my ears, especially while wearing earrings. Stopped using these.
customer_reviews.author: Cady

customer_reviews.title: They stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Soft, warm, comfortable, easy to put on, but kinda painful to remove, I must be doing it wrong. They stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: W. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great li'l warmers
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job of keeping my sensitive ears warm, without the bulk that other behind-the-head earmuffs have. They stay on well, though I haven't tested them running yet. Also fit earbuds underneath comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Ear muffs for travel and the cold.
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs take a small amount of adjusting to make sure they are secure but all in all they are exactly as described. I will say that my ears still feel cold to the touch if I remove the ear muffs and immediately make adjustments to my hair. However, I do not notice the cold as much when I am walking around in 40 degree temperature; with wind near the water here in Japan. I like the product and I think it does a pretty good job. I tend to travel pretty frequently and I think that these could hold up to the wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Ear Mitts are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who spends time working or playing outdoors in the cold, Ear Mitts are absolutely wonderful! No uncomfortable head/neck band to deal with, no slipping out of place, near zero reduction in hearing(a real plus), easy to use, super lightweight and comfortable, affordable, AND they keep your ears warm despite cold and wind chill factor! Have yet to try them in sub zero temperatures but since they fit comfortably under hat/sport helmet, they should perform well. Nice to find a simple product that simply works well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have loved my ear mitts for many years
customer_reviews.text: I have loved my ear mitts for many years! I was eager to buy two new pair to keep in the pocket of my winter coat and jacket so I would never be without.I have always hated hats and the ear mitts do the trick without messing my hair. I did the ear measurements and as they fell beneath the small size , I went with the small, as regular is the only other size from which to choose. Unfortunately they fit too tightly and I am not comfortable in them, so I am returning them for the regular.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Anzeveno

customer_reviews.title: Warm and confortable
customer_reviews.text: Use these ear warmers every day in the winter. Easy to use and comfortable. Can hear clearly even with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great is you don't want to mess up you hair
customer_reviews.text: quick and easy to use and I think is uniquely stylish
customer_reviews.author: AJ Voliton

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. I use a ceiling fan at night, and I started having earaches. These block the air from blowing on my ears. They stay put (unless you toss and turn a lot), and I forget that I have them on.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: These hurt my ears. I tried them on a ...
customer_reviews.text: These hurt my ears. I tried them on a number of times but they really hurt and I have normal sized ears. I was looking for something that would keep my ears warm while not ruining my hair but these are not the answer. The band around the back of your head ear muffs are just ok and I recently started using headbands but many of them are too thick all the way around and again ruin the doo. Please post if you found a solution to warmth and hair untouched. I'm still looking.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Blackman

customer_reviews.title: they are great for cutting down the wind noise when riding bikes ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife tried them out as a means to block out my snoring, something they are not designed for, but that didn't work. However, they are great for cutting down the wind noise when riding bikes so that the car behind you is better heard. I highly recommend them for outdoor activities, that would involve keeping the ears warm when a hat or cap is too much.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't had an opportunity to wear these since I ordered them some time ago, but with the record cold we've been having, today was the perfect time. In spite of the diagram that came with the ear muffs, I had a little trouble figuring out how to get them over my ears. Once I realized I was bending them the wrong way, it was a snap. I wore them under a hoodie and I have to say that my ears stayed warm in spite of the wind that occasionally blew up under the hood.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyleen

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Eh it's nice. My ears are rather small. I ordered a small. Wish there were an extra small. They fall off if I move my head to fast. I wanted to wear to work, I'm in the military, I got move my head lol! Great concept though.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra Fava

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way to keep wind out of ears!
customer_reviews.text: These bandless ear muffs are very nice. I dislike hats and these are better then the type with the band. They keep my ears toasty warm and it feels like I don't have anything on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Simoncini

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for my morning walks
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Keeps my ears warm during my morning walks.
customer_reviews.author: Kayvon Zad

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for a good friend
customer_reviews.text: When I got them I wanted to try them out so I could instruct my friend how to use them.....the instructions aren't that clear. The person who told me about these had to actually show me. You have to invert the mitt, and then put it up to your ear - straight side towards your face. Then, get the ear lobe into the little slot and then the top over the top of the ear and then "overt" the ear mitt....hard to describe....but they DO work and stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: yogawoods

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for moderately cold temperatures.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on those days when there's a cold breeze that would make your ears hurt. If you're out in the cold very long the cold will eventually find its way through these, though. Easy on and off after you've done it a couple times to see how.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small size because of having smaller ears and they fit perfect. They are much better quality than I expected. I had bought Earbag brand many years ago and these are by far better constructed and are much thicker material. I live in the northeast and it tends to get quite blustery in winter. So far they seem great at blocking the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Far better than earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite kind of earmuffs. You don't have to put it over your head and mess up your hair. You can wear them under any hat or hood. They're tiny and fit in your purse. You can take off just one if you need to while keeping the other ear warm. My toddler has her own pair as well and has no trouble wearing them. They're so comfortable, you forget you have them on. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CleverPenName

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY HOLLY!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough about these two cuties....keeps my ears toasty and very comfortable also....have normal sized ears so ordered a regular and they fit perfect....great invention!!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Holly S Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried to put these on with my earrings on (not large at all), and they wouldn't attach. I would get them around my ears and "click" them to attach, and they wouldn't grab my ears at all. After I took my earrings off, they did attach, but not securely at all. They certainly do not "hug" my ears like I would want them to do. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Tana

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. fit well
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. fit well, easy to put on, sturdy, just the right size. Didn't like the tags inside each so took them out. Maybe if they were printed on a non-silky material I would have left them in. It would be nice to have a draw string storage bag to keep them together in the other seasons or in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Warm ears! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these when going out for a walk and they were wonderful. The wind was very cold and gusty but these mitts kept my ears toasty.I wear glasses and the mitts fit right on over the bows with no problem. And no hat hair! Being bandless also makes them easy to put in your pocket, or toss in your purse or backpack. I'm very happy I have them, they're the best!
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Love These Ear Mitts!
customer_reviews.text: “I LOVE my ear muffs. I have a condition that prevents me from wearing anything tight on my head yet need to have ear coverings in windy and/or cold weather. I researched band less ear muffs, and found these. Over the years countless women have either chased me down or stopped me in a store to ask about these - I usually end up giving a demonstration on how they work, and where to find them.”
customer_reviews.author: CPS

customer_reviews.title: Warm and very soft material
customer_reviews.text: These will act as a wind barrier during extreme cold weather. I found them to be very comfortable. I hung them on the back of my ear and that was secure enough to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Musicrules

customer_reviews.title: great ear muffs at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I measured my ear before purchasing to make sure i bought the correct size, and they fit perfectly. They also stay on and are more comfortable than other ear muffs i've had. I wore them while outside for 3 hours toboganning in 25 degree weather and my ears stayed warm. I bought high-tech ear muffs (with a band across the back of the head) at Academy, which cost twice as much as these, and they were less comfortable and didn't stay on as well.
customer_reviews.author: User2

customer_reviews.title: Always ready in my pocket
customer_reviews.text: Ear pops are comfortable and keep my ears warm. Under the hair, they're almost hidden and don't leave my hair smashed flat. I've worn them for years, 6 or 7, I think and would never want anything else. I Keep them in my pocket, so whenever it's windy or cold, I can pop them on. Just be sure to read directions to get them on the first time or two.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Ear Mitts
customer_reviews.text: Ear Mitts. I love mine have had them for 25 years. These were a gift for my grandson. Now may have to buy another set for his brother.
customer_reviews.author: CANDICE

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of these because I don't wear hats
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these because I don't wear hats. They work good if you're just standing at an event or going for a walk. I tried to wear them when I took my boys sledding. My coat collar kept touching them, making them fall off. You also can't wear glasses or sunglasses with them, they will pop off.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and warmth
customer_reviews.text: Just love these ear muffs. They are nicely made but very light weight. Very easy to put on and I am amazed how securely they cling to the ear. I have used them once as it is not really cold yet. Felt good and comfortable. Definitely recommend them over the traditional over the head muffs!
customer_reviews.author: Retta

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These secure themselves to your ears by "popping" an internal piece a certain way that pulls slightly away from your head. While the pulling was very slight, it was enough to make them uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: The ERISA Dude

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest!
customer_reviews.text: My ears are very sensitive to cold and it has always been difficult for me to find a hat that protects my ears that I can stand wearing. I ordered a pair of these last year but made the mistake of getting small. They kept my ears toasty warm but were a bit uncomfortable because of the size. The regular sized ones are perfect! Not looking forward to cold weather again, but when it comes I'll be prepared!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Husband doesn't wear them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair a few years ago in a local store for my husband. He has since lost them so I purchased this pair online. Very disappointed. Husband doesn't wear them. They rub the outer portion of his ear (the tip?). I looked online to see if I could buy a larger size but it comes in two sizes and I bought the "regular" which is the largest size. Maybe this is not for adults?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K

customer_reviews.title: Love the fur on these
customer_reviews.text: Love the fur on these. They are a little stiff and do not come with a bag like the other ones I ordered that’s the only reason I didn’t give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Flora

customer_reviews.title: Ear Mitts No More !
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid hiker and these ear mitts looked like the perfect solution to keeping my ears warm without having to wear the uncomfortable headbands that pinch. That was not the case. I tried them several times and worked with them to see if I could get them to fit and stay on. I could feel the cold air leaking thru even when I had secured them to my ears. I really wanted these to work.....they looked pretty awesome. I probably have weird ears that can't hold the Ear Mitts on! It's back to the headband.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Really nice ear mitts!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I ordered in a size large. They are truly perfect for being active. Putting them on is easy and simple and once they are on you do not have to worry about them falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Aviana N.

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your ears
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept and overall they serve their purpose, but not really meant for active outdoor use, meaning they could easily pop off if you are doing more than taking a walk. Women will need to think about earrings because they can get in the way for sure making these a little awkward sometimes. In general though a nice option to keep your ears warm without sporting a hair style destroying beanie
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear in the cold.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Ear Mitts to keep my ears warm when I go walking. I am not a big winter hat person so these Ear Mitts did the trick. Bought the medium size, easy to take on and off, and comfortable to wear. I wear glasses and these Mitts did not interfere with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: I can’t live without these. I don’t like wearing hats but my ears get super cold very easily. I’ve been using this brand for years and like them better than any other brand. They stay on and keep my ears warm. They fit over ear buds, too. Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: B Britton

customer_reviews.title: Great fleece bandless ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a four star rating because they really are likable ear muffs that fully cover the ears. They are better and warmer than similar ear muffs that are simply a protective shell of polyester without any added insulation. 100g Thinsulate for ear muffs is a lot for mere ear muffs because, most gloves on the market have a mere 40g of thinsulate which is not much. They are also a little more discreet compared to banded ear muffs.
customer_reviews.author: MCW

customer_reviews.title: These really work, folks
customer_reviews.text: I used my ear mitts for the first time yesterday on a 16 mile bicycle ride with the temperature at 38 degrees and a 10 mph breeze out of the north. They worked perfectly. They fit under my bike helmet with no problems, and were plenty warm and very comfortable. It helps to read the enclosed instructions about how to pop them open and shut.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Tope

customer_reviews.title: Not for small ears...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these - but I couldn't get them to stay on my ears. If you have larger ears they may work for you. However, my husband (with larger ears) tried them and they wouldn't stay on either. Also, I should add that we wore them for cycling and any amount of wind would take them right off... Perhaps if you were just walking around it wouldn't be an issue... again for larger ears..
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Warm and un-bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, just get a bright color so you don't lose them among your other stuff! They clip on well and are an enormous help in the frightful winter winds we get here (I have a big knot of hair and can't wear hats, and hate wearing hoods or scarves on my head). And if you find you don't need them, they fit nicely into any pocket w/o stiff headbands or other bulky features.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I had something similar years ago. So glad to have a pair again! They really protect my ears from the wind & still let me hear what's going on around me. Love that they come in lots of colors these days.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R. LeHunt

customer_reviews.title: ... to wear these but now that I have I love them. Have already worn them on windy days
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few minutes to get the hang of how to wear these but now that I have I love them. Have already worn them on windy days!
customer_reviews.author: njkennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good ear-warmers
customer_reviews.text: These work remarkably well! Keeping your ears warm seems like 99% of keeping your entire head warm. Only downside: they are very easy to misplace because they are small and in two separate parts.
customer_reviews.author: melnyc

customer_reviews.title: Ear Mitts are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought EarZ years ago from a TV shopping show and used each year ~ very satisfied. When we were looking to purchase more we were directed to these Ear Mitts. Now there are so many more colors :) Many of our family members & friends have also purchased. Everyone agrees they are wonderful for the cold and even wind. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: evergrn

customer_reviews.title: Warm and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design and fitment. After measuring using their sizing chart, I determined that I needed the smaller size due to my ears being rather small for my size (6'2"!) and they fit just fine. There's very little chance of them coming off during use and they keep my ears warm even in 20F and lower temperatures with wind.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: YOU wish you came up with BAND-less ear muffs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME! Especially as a girl/lady/women when you are having a fabulous hair day and you don't necessarily want to ruin your hair or have hat hair. It's nice, b/c these bandless ear muffs can hide under your hair while you shop around town, taking that first step into the cold, etc. Just be careful not to wear them when playing in the snow!
customer_reviews.author: N.L.T

customer_reviews.title: Better than I initially thought
customer_reviews.text: When I received these, I was surprised that they are two separate muffs, with nothing connecting them. Guess I didn't read the description carefully enough. They go on the ears like socks go on feet - one at a time and the ears go into the muffs.. After using these, I think they are better than traditional ear muffs that just push against the ears. It takes a little practice to get them on but they look good and keep the ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone and heard back that they were pretty much useless as they don't stay on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: SFlower102

customer_reviews.title: Fold nice and flat and clip on easily
customer_reviews.text: I get ear aches from cold wind so I have these in every one of my winter coats so I’m not ever without. Folds nice and flat. I have purchased these for my daughters since they suffer from same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Huenefeldt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Please.......I have about 8 pairs of these bad boys in many colors!!! Hate hats, love warmth. People look at ya weirdly at first but then ALWAYS comment how cool they are and ask where I got them! They are warm, they stay on...what's not to love?! Try 'em.........great product and seller!!
customer_reviews.author: barb hartman

customer_reviews.title: They just don't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but they just don't stay on. I have regular sized ears and I bought the regular sized ear cuffs, but as soon as you move your head just a little they fall right off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. I got the small ones and my ears are about 3" from top to lobe. They fit great most of the time and definitely keep my ears warm as soon as I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Zeph

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These Ear Mitts are very cool! I ordered the small for my daughter and tried them on and they fit me perfectly. I'll try them on her after school and if they fit I'll order another pair. So nice to not have to have a band over your hair or have to wear a hat which ruins your hair do!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Warm
customer_reviews.text: These ear Mitts are extremely easy to put on. They're soft and warm and cocoon both of my ears in comfort without headbands - either over the head or in back of the head. Several people at work have asked about them and I gladly refer them to Amazon to find them. They're also much more comfortable than a different product that purports to do the same thing that I bought two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Drahnak

customer_reviews.title: Be patient.
customer_reviews.text: Takes practice to get them on properly, but keep trying. I might have bought a larger size, and the fitting would be easier? Once on, they do the job To keep the wind off my ears. They lay smoothly against the side of the face. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gribble

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have had mine for years and have bought some for my friends, too. Keeping your ears warm is so important and not messing your hair is just as important. This does both!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I love how easily these fit into my pockets and my wife loves that she can put them on without worrying about all of her hair like most ear warmers with the head band. I do feel some pressure on my big ears but even after a couple of hours of wear they weren't hurting and my ears were still warm. I haven't tried them in sub zero temperature but for the 20s and 30s i think these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Wright

customer_reviews.title: No messy hair ear mitts!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my ear mitts!! I'd much rather have these than regular ear muffs. Soooo nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb powell

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Put On and Secure
customer_reviews.text: I like them because they're not huge, obnoxious ear muffs and they do keep the ears warm. However, they're hard to get on - especially around earrings and hair that may be blowing in the way; ou really need two hands to put one on. And, they don't alway pop into place as they should. I'm surprised I have lost one yet.
customer_reviews.author: jmcato

customer_reviews.title: Too big, uncomfortable clip pressure
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of these from a friend who loved hers. When I ordered these (reg. size) they seemed huge compared to the ones my freind had. I learned she has a different brand - "ear bags." In any case, I really loved the lime green color but once on for about 10min, the pressure from having them clipped on my ears was very uncomfortable. Perhaps this is not an issue for many, but was enough for me to choose to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of this type of ear muff-they snap ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this type of ear muff-they snap on nicely and, in most cases, hold their own. However, the next ones I buy will be a bit thicker. While these did the job, you could feel the cold after a period of time outside. Even still, these are worthy if you're not going to be out in the cold for a while.
customer_reviews.author: macgage

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! Engineering disaster. They basically don't stay ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Engineering disaster. They basically don't stay on and for the few seconds they do, they let lots of air in, so you freeze anyway. This product should not exist
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and keep the cold off my ears while running!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear while running, and they are fantastic! Very comfortable and warm. I can also wear my earbuds under them with no discomfort. Perfect for those chilly winter runs!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo tight, they crush and hurt my ears!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lynne

customer_reviews.title: These are fun!
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs go on an off easily, and are a great barrier to wind. They work in temps down to the 40s, but I don't know how well they'd do much colder than that. I would still use them in colder temps, and add the protection of a scarf. It's fun to show others how they "pop" on and off! Best of all, they fit in my coat pocket without taking up much room, so they are always there.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harrell

product_meta.title: Ear Mitts Bandless Ear Muffs For Men & Women, Soft Fleece Ear Warmers, 2 Sizes
product_meta.description:
Ear Mitts are designed to fit securely on your ears, keeping them protected from the wind and cold. Three layers - soft and durable lightweight anti-pill fleece, 100 gram Thinsulate Insulation from 3M, and a fleece inner lining – keep warmth in and the wind and cold air out. A patented flexible polypropylene frame adjusts to your ears and becomes more comfortable the more you wear them. A stylish alternative to traditional scarves and band ear muffs, Ear Mitts provide warmth and comfort without interfering with your hairstyle! They also fit comfortably under helmets, caps, stocking hats, hard hats – any headgear! Comes in two sizes- Regular and Small. The design also permits unrestricted hearing during use. Compact enough to fit in a pocket, fanny pack, or hand bag. For care, hand-wash and dry flat, no bleach, no iron. Available in fleece, denim, faux fur, faux leather, faux suede, velvet, sparkle, and embellished with Swarovski Crystals – See our other products on Amazon!




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4 x 3 x 0.5 inches; 0.16 Ounces
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :September 3, 2008
 * ASIN :B001F8LJ7O

    *  #17 inWomen's Earmuffs 
    *  #58899 inMen's Shops

A patented flexible polypropylene frame adjusts to your ears and becomes more comfortable the more you wear them. A stylish alternative to traditional scarves and band ear muffs, Ear Mitts provide warmth and comfort without interfering with your hairstyle! They also fit comfortably under helmets, caps, stocking hats, hard hats – any headgear! Comes in two sizes- Regular and Small. The design also permits unrestricted hearing during use. Compact enough to fit in a pocket, fanny pack, or hand bag. For care, hand-wash and dry flat, no bleach, no iron. Available in fleece, denim, faux fur, faux leather, faux suede, velvet, sparkle, and embellished with Swarovski Crystals – See our other products on Amazon!
feature_bullets: Slip-on bandless Ear Mitts fit comfortably and securely while preserving your hairstyle. Can be worn under any headgear and over earbuds!
Three layers of soft thermal fleece and 100 gram 3M Thinsulate Insulation will keep your ears toasty and warm
Durable patented frame made from polypropylene that adjusts to your ears for the perfect fit
Anti-pill fleece is protected with Teflon fabric protector for use in all weather, wet or dry
Small and lightweight for easy storage. Wear under your hat or hood and easily store in your pocket or purse!
